The cushioned and 360-degree supportive synthetic leather upper of these sandals feature adjustable hook-and-loop straps that provide a custom fit. These outdoor sandals are designed with textile insole and lining that takes your comfort to the next level. Offering a cushioned feel, these leather sandals are the perfect footwear for your outdoor trips and rides. Regular fit. Open, round toe silhouette. Cushioned EVA midsole. Rubber outsole. Imported.

products.name: SILVIA TCHERASSI Sherry Dress in Teal
products.brandedName: Silvia Tcherassi Sherry Dress in Teal
products.description: SILVIA TCHERASSI Sherry Dress in Teal 94% silk 6% elastane. Made in Colombia. Dry clean only. Fully lined. Pull-on styling. Halterneck tie. Satin fabric. STCH-WD99. ST240544. About the designer: Silvia Tcherassi is a luxury Latin American brand known for its constant innovation and evolution in design, while remaining true to its original identity. The brand continuously aims to fulfill the needs of today's women internationally who are readily on the pulse of trends and cycles in search of the latest in unique and refined designs. By seamlessly blending tradition and modern elements embodied in exclusive pieces and limited editions, the brand has gained worldwide popularity among globe-trotting fashion lovers everywhere. This vision is described as casual luxury, where the artistic use of high quality materials, textures, color and the purity of the construction are outstanding.

Technology Run Type: Road Pronation: Neutral Surface Type: Road Engineered Mesh: hugs the foot for a secure fit while also improving breathability. products.brandedName: Perkies Petals
products.description: Petals Petals Matte nipple covers with silicone adhesive backing. Imported. Perkies Petals should be washed with mild soap and air dried to activate stickiness.. Reusable and waterproof. Can be worn with our without a bra. Remove the protective film of the Perkies Petals with the adhesives face up, place in your hands. Paste the Petals on the nipple and smooth the edges. Do not wear longer than 8 hours. PKIE-WI4. PET-P3.

products.name: Off-White Leather Ooo Sneakers
products.brandedName: Off-White Leather Ooo Sneakers
products.description: Theres a story behind the statement OOO sneakers by Off-White. The brands founder Virgil Abloh set out to create a tennis shoe with a late '80s-early '90s tone that was versatile enough to be worn every single day. The result is these low-top beauties, which have street, basketball and running influences.
